---
title: "Plastic Waste 2023 analisis"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
plastic <- read.csv("plastic.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
pointsmtkg <- ggplot(plastic, aes(x=Total_Plastic_Waste_MT, y=Per_Capita_Waste_KG,alpha = 0.5, fill = Country)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```

```{r fig.height=100, fig.width=100}
ggplotly(pointsmtkg)
```

```{r}
boxplotmtkg <- ggplot(plastic, aes(x=Total_Plastic_Waste_MT, y=Per_Capita_Waste_KG, fill = Country)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

```

```{r}
ggplotly(boxplotmtkg)
```
